Software quotes

Published: September 4, 2012

“In God we trust. All others must bring data.”- W. Edwards Deming, Statistician

“Web users ultimately want to get at data quickly and easily. They don’t care as much about attractive sites and pretty design.”- Tim Berners-Lee

Not everything that can be counted counts, and not everything that counts can be counted. William Bruce Cameron (not Albert Einstein)

Without An Opinion, You’re Just Another Person With Data - W. Edwards Deming

Share on Twitter
